com.hazelcast.internal.partition.impl

Class InternalPartitionServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.internal.partition.impl.InternalPartitionServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterStateListener, ClusterVersionListener, InternalPartitionService, CoreService, EventPublishingService<PartitionEvent,PartitionEventListener<PartitionEvent>>, GracefulShutdownAwareService, ManagedService, IPartitionService, PartitionAwareService

    public class InternalPartitionServiceImpl
extends Object
implements InternalPartitionService, ManagedService, EventPublishingService<PartitionEvent,PartitionEventListener<PartitionEvent>>, PartitionAwareService, ClusterStateListener, ClusterVersionListener
    The InternalPartitionService implementation.

        If the owner of the partition is not set yet, it will trigger partition assignment.

      • firstArrangement

        public PartitionRuntimeState firstArrangement()
        Description copied from interface: InternalPartitionService
        Causes the partition table to be arranged and published to members if :
        • this instance has started
        • this instance is the master
        • the cluster is ClusterState.ACTIVE
        • if the partition table has not already been arranged
        • if there is no cluster membership change
        If this instance is not the master, it will trigger the master to assign the partitions.
        Specified by:
        firstArrangement in interface InternalPartitionService
        Returns:
        PartitionRuntimeState if this node is the master and the partition table is initialized
        See Also:
        PartitionStateManager.initializePartitionAssignments(java.util.Set)

      • setInitialState

        public void setInitialState(PartitionTableView partitionTable)
        Sets the initial partition table and state version. If any partition has a replica, the partition state manager is set to initialized, otherwise #partitionStateManager#isInitialized() stays uninitialized but the current state will be updated nevertheless. This method acquires the partition service lock.
        Parameters:
        partitionTable - the initial partition table
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the partition manager has already been initialized

        public int getMaxAllowedBackupCount()
        Description copied from interface: IPartitionService
        Returns maximum allowed backup count according to current cluster formation and partition group configuration.

        The returned number will be in the range of [0, IPartition.MAX_BACKUP_COUNT].

        Specified by:
        getMaxAllowedBackupCount in interface IPartitionService
        Returns:
        max allowed backup count

      • onClusterVersionChange

        public void onClusterVersionChange(Version newVersion)
        Description copied from interface: ClusterVersionListener
        Invoked on registered listeners after the new cluster version has been applied. Listeners are executed synchronously immediately after ClusterStateManager#version has been updated and while the cluster service lock ClusterServiceImpl#lock is still locked, as part of the commit phase of the transaction changing the cluster version. Unhandled exceptions from listeners implementation will break the new version commit and a slow implementation will stall the system and may cause a transaction timeout. If new cluster version is null and property GroupProperty.INIT_CLUSTER_VERSION is set, the version set by this property will be provided as argument to the listener. If neither are set, running node's codebase version will be used.
        Specified by:
        onClusterVersionChange in interface ClusterVersionListener
        Parameters:
        newVersion - the new version

      • createPartitionState

        public PartitionRuntimeState createPartitionState()
        Description copied from interface: InternalPartitionService
        Creates the current partition runtime state. May return null if the node should fetch the most recent partition table (e.g. this node is a newly appointed master) or if the partition state manager is not initialized.
        Specified by:
        createPartitionState in interface InternalPartitionService
        Returns:
        the current partition state
        See Also:
        isFetchMostRecentPartitionTableTaskRequired(), FetchPartitionStateOperation, PartitionStateManager.isInitialized()

      • createPartitionStateInternal

        public PartitionRuntimeState createPartitionStateInternal()
        Returns a copy of the partition table or null if not initialized. This method will acquire the partition service lock.

      • processPartitionRuntimeState

        public boolean processPartitionRuntimeState(PartitionRuntimeState partitionState)
        Sets the partitionState if the node is started and the state is sent by the master known by this node.
        Parameters:
        partitionState - the new partition state
        Returns:
        true if the partition state was applied

      • getPartition

        public InternalPartition getPartition(int partitionId)
        Description copied from interface: IPartitionService
        Returns the IPartition for a given partition ID.

        If the owner of the partition is not set yet, it will trigger partition assignment.

        The IPartition for a given partition ID will never change, so the result can be cached safely.

        Specified by:
        getPartition in interface InternalPartitionService
        Specified by:
        getPartition in interface IPartitionService
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition ID
        Returns:
        the IPartition

      • getPartition

        public InternalPartition getPartition(int partitionId,
                                      boolean triggerOwnerAssignment)
        Description copied from interface: IPartitionService
        Returns the IPartition for a given partition ID.

        If the owner of the partition is not set yet and triggerOwnerAssignment is true, it will trigger partition assignment.

        The IPartition for a given partition ID will never change, so the result can be cached safely.

        Specified by:
        getPartition in interface InternalPartitionService
        Specified by:
        getPartition in interface IPartitionService
        Parameters:
        partitionId - the partition ID
        triggerOwnerAssignment - flag to trigger the partition assignment
        Returns:
        the IPartition

      • onShutdown

        public boolean onShutdown(long timeout,
                          TimeUnit unit)
        Description copied from interface: GracefulShutdownAwareService
        A hook method that's called during graceful shutdown to provide safety for data managed by this service. Shutdown process is blocked until this method returns or shutdown timeouts. If this method does not return in time, then it's considered as failed to gracefully shutdown.
        Specified by:
        onShutdown in interface GracefulShutdownAwareService
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout for graceful shutdown
        unit - time unit
        Returns:
        true if graceful shutdown is successful, false otherwise
